description: flat sides; four feet at outer corners; edges flare inward and outward slightly at top rim; small rectangular cover with vertical four-sides finial with irregular, globular knob; four rectangular cutouts at corners of cover; very small interior space; white with colorful glaze decoration of three turquoise, rust red and tan birds perched on dry foliage
markings: on underside, stamped: maker\'s mark (Asian characters)
provenance: Harry Drake (purchased from Joan B Mirviss Ltd 5/16/2006, $6,250)
signed: Painted near base: Jun no in; incised on base: Take
title: Untitled [Incense burner decorated with kingfishers]
